comments.description: Registers a new Prompt to be tracked for a particular BrowsingContext. We need to track a Prompt so that we can, for example, force-close the TabModalPrompt if the originating subframe or tab unloads or crashes.

tags.description: The TabModalPrompt that will be shown to the user.
